rows.label: qst005201_msg0001
rows.name:
The beast-form Blade's Driver?
You won't find him here.

rows.label: qst005201_msg0002
rows.name:
He lets his Blade, Akatsuki, relay all
his orders. Never shows his own face.

rows.label: qst005201_msg0003
rows.name:
His orders always produce results,
but I suppose he made a mistake
this time letting you go.

rows.label: qst005201_msg0004
rows.name:
No matter, though...
I'll clean up the mess he left behind!
